Name: Julio Cesar
description:
Julio is a 64 year old man. He is married and has 1 child. He lives with his family in the town of Olanchito, Yoro. For 37 years he has earned a living through sowing and producing palm oil. The crop is located in the same town that he lives in.

He sells the produce that he gets to local agents. He is asking for a loan from ODEF for the quantity of 12,000 Lempiras, to invest in the purchase of fertilisers and composts to help palm oil. This loan will help him to have more production and a better quality of harvest. His plan is to continue working to improve his quality of life and that of his family.
